General.Name: Forza Land Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Forza Land Indonesia Tbk engages in the property development business in Indonesia. It primarily develops industrial estates, apartment buildings, condominiums, offices, and shops and facilities, as well as other residential projects. The company was formerly known as PT Megah Satu Properti and changed its name to PT Forza Land Indonesia Tbk in 2016. PT Forza Land Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2012 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
